title: Russian apple pie
ingredients: ['For the base', '250g plain flour', '100g soured cream', '150g melted butter', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', 'For the filling', '1 egg', '200g soured cream', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '200g caster sugar', '1kg tart green apples (i.e. Granny Smith), peeled, cored and sliced thinly']
